basics.name: Oscar Stommendal
basics.label: MSc Physics Student @ Chalmers University of Technology
basics.summary: Hard-working, curious and very competitive MSc student in physics at Chalmers University of Technology with a particularly burning interest in science. With my calm, cheerful and humble personality, I am a team player who always strives to achieve the best results. I have a strong analytical ability and a methodical approach to problem-solving. I am also very driven and goal-oriented, which makes me very result-oriented.

competences.name: Practical experience of engineering work (mainly within programming) through internships
Goal-oriented and competitive – hence very result-oriented

work.name: Norra Älvsborgs Länssjukhus (NÄL), Trollhättan, Sweden
work.summary: Responsible for the kitchen area at the X-ray department. Also got to see much of the daily work and help with simple tasks, such like calling patients to appointments.

work.name: ICA Supermarket, Mellerud, Sweden
work.summary: Cashier responsibilities, goods unpacking and charcuterie. I also got to mentor new starters. This was a valuable experience since I got to meet and handle lots of different people.

work.name: Nordisk Rörmärkning AB, Älvängen, Sweden
work.summary: Solved different tasks to make the company’s website and customer orders more efficient and automated through Excel. Here I learned to use basic Visual Basic.

work.name: GKN Aerospace, Trollhättan, Sweden
work.summary: Department of product integration and simulation. The work mostly consisted of programming in Python, where I simplified and automated data collection for test runs within a certain project, and created a program to execute stress calculations on bodies created in ANSYS (CAD).

work.name: GKN Aerospace, Trollhättan, Sweden
work.summary: I got the opportunity to extend the contract at GKN as a Research Technician. I worked partly in Matlab for automatic data collection during test runs within a certain project, where I improved and streamlined the code, and developed it to analyze more data. I also developed a package in Python that can be used internally at GKN to create and edit so-called Quality Assurance documents, which ensure the quality and use of a software or package.
